name: Movies, Music and Meaning
description: This course examines the synergistic relationship between the moving image and music and how these synergies result in processes of meaning-making and communication. Drawing on readings in cultural theory, cultural studies, musicology and film studies, the course considers examples from the feature film, the Hollywood musical, and the animated cartoon.Same as VPMC85H3
prerequisites: ACMB01H3 and [[2.0 credits at the B-level in MDS courses] or [2.0 credits at the B-level in VPM courses]]
